lines.text: How many more worlds have to burn before you're satisfied, Gabriel?
Just the one. This one.
[rips Rafayel's heart out causing him to scream from pain]
I'm not greedy.
There's a small step from prophet to martyr. Can you take it?

[last line of the movie]
Phone's gonna ring... It's gonna be you-know-who. Everything's gonna be made right. Phone's gonna ring.
[Izzy is reaching for fruit from a tree in Eden]
Don't eat that! Trust me.
So, you're keeping me alive because you don't know DOS?
So you'll become what you loathe the most.
Ironic, isn't it? An archangel needs a monkey to get a vision from God.
Monkey wannabe.
[Watching the cop talk on the handheld radio]
May I ask, you fellas use that to what, talk to each other? Yeah?
What, are you high? It's a radio. Yeah.
It's a miracle. Shh.
[puts him to sleep, takes the gun and radio]
Okay. Pop quiz.
[sets the gun next to Izzy]
How do you make that work?
[lays the radio down, too]
How do you use that? Hmm?
[Izzy picks up the gun and shoots herself]
Are we having a communication problem? What?

Let's understand each other. I sang the first hymn when the stars were born. Not that long ago, I announced to a young woman, Mary, who it was she was expecting. On the other hand, I've turned rivers into blood, kings into cripples, cities to salt - so I don't think that I have to explain myself to you.

[referring to God]
It's not that he stopped loving you. It's because you don't listen.
What does he say ?

[whispers into Gabriel's ear]
Jump.
I'll see you in Heaven, baby.
Is that her?
Bingo.
I'd get the fuck out of here if I were you.
I want to be with Julian. Please. Why can't you just let me die?
One way or the other, this war ends tonight.

He's gone. He's dead. He's taking a dirt nap. Look, I need your help. I'm short staffed at the moment. Don't start. Don't start. I hate that, please. He's the cold eye. He's spilled milk. Come on, come on kiddo. Come on kiddo, we got work to do.
